thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | flashbay.com.au
thread.title: Santi

author: Santi
title: Santi
text:
Allister and FlashBay beat their competitors by far. I was just asking for the Quote: via website, then Allister called me within the same day and the next day the box of sample USBs turned up in the morning.
Every time, we are asking for Quote: s or proofs - the turnaround times are second to none. The prices and services are better than the other competitors, too.
Allister, you are a fabulous Salesperson to deal with. Keep up the good works!
